segments.text: I'm watching the little boy, he's quite the climber.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable, but he's determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar already!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister, she's standing there with her hand out, so eager.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are fixed on that jar, just waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s so adorable, their little secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They clearly think they're being very stealthy, the sneaky little things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They have no idea about the flood behind their mother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent joy over cookies is just infectious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a moment of pure, unadulterated childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even with the danger, their faces are alight with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the stool finally tips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That would be a shame to ruin such a perfect plan.
segments.speaker: PAR
